Major_Arcs.title: Initial Conflict in Ghost Town
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the central characters, setting, and the initial relationship conflict between the woman in the green hat (Nan) and the cowboy (Cal), along with the disruptive news of the airport plan.

sub_scenes.title: Saloon Argument and Cowboy's Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the initial argument between the woman in green hat and the cowboy in the saloon and outdoors, culminating in the cowboy's frustrated departure from Ghost Town.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to the Girl from Ghost Town and Initial Conflict

sub_scenes.title: Airport Plan Revelation and Cowboy's Reaction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the surveyors and their plan to build an airport, highlighting the cowboy's shocked reaction and the woman's opposition.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival of Surveyors and the Airport Plan
Cowboy's Shock and the Impending Destruction of Ghost Town

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Misunderstandings and Rising Town Tension
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Nan and Cal's romantic issues, the introduction of rough men, and Nan's growing distress and resolve.

sub_scenes.title: Nan and Cal's Parting and Nan's Reflection
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene continues Nan and Cal's conversation, focusing on their romantic misunderstandings and Nan's subsequent reflections on love and their argument.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan and Cal's Romantic Misunderstanding and Parting
Nan's Reflection on Love and Past Hurt

sub_scenes.title: Arrival of Rough Men and Father's Scolding
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the rough men and the growing discontent in Ghost Town, followed by Nan's humiliating confrontation with her father.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival of Rough Men and Discontent with 'Progress'
Businessmen Discuss Airport and Horses, Nan Interjects

sub_scenes.title: Consolation and Nan's Resolve
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Nan being consoled by her mother and maid, leading to her resolve to confront Cal.

narrative_arcs.title: Mother and Maid Console Nan About Cal

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation, Departure, Loneliness, and Return
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Nan's confrontation with Cal, his departure, her subsequent loneliness, and his unexpected return.

Major_Arcs.title: Winter Storm and Community Response
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts the focus to a severe winter storm hitting Ghost Town, the community's worry about livestock, and the arrival of aid.

sub_scenes.title: Emotional Conversation and Winter's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene starts with Nan and Cal's emotional conversation and transitions to the arrival of harsh winter weather.

sub_scenes.title: Community Worry and Seeking Comfort
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the community's worry about the livestock due to the snowstorm and a brief moment of indoor comfort and reassurance.

sub_scenes.title: Escalating Storm and Hope from the Sky
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the worsening snowstorm, Cal's resolve to act, and the unexpected arrival of aid from the sky.

narrative_arcs.title: Hope from the Sky: Arrival of the Plane and Fodder

sub_scenes.title: Reflection on Romance amidst Reality
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes page 8 with Nan and Cal reflecting on romance in the face of the harsh realities of the West.

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction and Town Gossip of Chane Benson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Chane Benson and the town's varied reactions to his dramatic arrival and character.

sub_scenes.title: Chane Benson's Showdown and Town Reactions
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Chane Benson through a fight and shows the immediate reactions and gossip among the townspeople.

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Hero Worship and Sister's Concern
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts focus to Jeff, his past hero worship of his father, and his sister's present-day concerns about his unhealthy admiration and behavior.

narrative_arcs.title: Reminiscing About Jeff's Childhood Hero Worship
Justifying Actions with Clyde Surrett's Example
Dismissing Chane Benson and Embracing Violence

Major_Arcs.title: Seeking Help and Mounting Tension with Jeff
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the woman's growing hopelessness regarding Jeff, her plea for help from Clyde, and the introduction of Chane Benson as a menacing figure.

sub_scenes.title: Hopelessness and Plea for Help
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the woman's internal despair about correcting Jeff's path and her decision to seek help from Clyde.

narrative_arcs.title: Expressing Fear and Seeking Help from Clyde
Declaration of Love and Duty Towards Jeff
Reassurance and Promise of Shared Happiness

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Disappearance and Introduction to Benson
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals Jeff's disappearance, the woman's pursuit, and introduces Mr. Benson, highlighting his menacing character.

narrative_arcs.title: Jeff's Disappearance and Pursuit to Town
Introduction of Mr. Benson and Seeking Advice
Chane Benson's Menacing Demeanor and Disdain for Young Boys

Major_Arcs.title: Newspaper Conflict and Dinner with Benson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc revolves around the fallout from an article about Benson, the threats he makes, and the editor's stand, culminating in a tense dinner invitation.

sub_scenes.title: Article Fallout and Editor's Stand
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the confrontation regarding the article about Benson, Benson's threats, and the editor's decision to stand against him.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation about the Article and Benson's Threat
Warning about Benson's Cunning and Cowardice
Seeking Action from the Editor and Decision to Stay
Clyde's Unwavering Resolve and Benson's Character

sub_scenes.title: Dinner Invitation and Tense Dinner
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the shifting opinions on Benson, the dinner invitation, and the uneasy dinner itself.

narrative_arcs.title: Shifting Opinions and Dinner Invitation Idea

Major_Arcs.title: Escalating Conflict and Rescue Attempt
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the escalating tension after the dinner, leading to a confrontation, fight, and a race to rescue Clyde from Benson.

sub_scenes.title: Moonlight Charm and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with a seemingly calm moonlight scene but quickly escalates into confrontation and forced affection.

sub_scenes.title: Fight, Warning, and Race to Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the immediate aftermath of the confrontation, including a fight, a warning about Clyde's danger, and Jeff's race to rescue him.

narrative_arcs.title: Fight, Warning, and Race to Rescue Clyde

Major_Arcs.title: Capture and Newspaper Resilience
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows Clyde's capture by Benson, a flashback to the Clarion office, and the newspaper team's resolve to publish despite the crisis.

sub_scenes.title: Showdown and Capture
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the showdown between Benson and Clyde, leading to Clyde's capture.

sub_scenes.title: Flashback and Clarion's Determination
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes a flashback to the Clarion office, followed by the team's efforts to publish the newspaper despite the challenges.

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Steve Daley and Ranch Conflicts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Steve Daley and focuses on ranch-related conflicts, including a confrontation and management discussions.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Confrontation and Daley's Introduction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with a ranch confrontation and then introduces Steve Daley to Betsy.

sub_scenes.title: Bunk Assignment and Ranch Troubles
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes bunk assignment for Steve, Hank defending his hiring, and discussion about ranch problems.

sub_scenes.title: Buckboard Ride and Town Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features a buckboard ride, Betsy's reflections, Hank giving orders, and their arrival in town.

Major_Arcs.title: Town Confrontation and Bodyguard Confirmation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on a town confrontation involving Betsy and Steve, leading to Betsy confirming Steve's role as her bodyguard.

sub_scenes.title: Town Gossip and Slap
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts town gossip about Betsy, leading to a confrontation and a physical slap.

sub_scenes.title: Bodyguard Decision and Hank's Plea
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene confirms Steve's role as bodyguard, followed by Hank's plea to keep his job.

narrative_arcs.title: Hank's Job Secured and Gratitude Expressed

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Climax and Bridges' War Declaration
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the romantic climax between Betsy and Steve, followed by the arrival of Old Man Bridges and his declaration of war.

sub_scenes.title: Job Conditions and Romantic Confession
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features Betsy setting job conditions for Steve, leading to a romantic confession and embrace.

narrative_arcs.title: Clarification and Choice about Gunfighter Role
Betsy's Change of Heart and Plea to Stay

sub_scenes.title: Bridges' Arrival and Confrontation Escalation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Bridges' arrival, the escalating confrontation with Betsy, and the interpretation of his actions as a declaration of war.

narrative_arcs.title: Analysis of the Confrontation as a Declaration of War
Betsy's Assertion of Authority and Gun Ownership
Steve's Reflection, Flashback to Ambush, and Hank's Fate

Major_Arcs.title: Devil's Pass and Romantic Reunion
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Steve's determined departure, Betsy's pursuit to Devil's Pass, the confrontation, and their romantic reunion after the ordeal.

sub_scenes.title: Steve's Departure and Betsy's Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Steve's determined departure to Devil's Pass and Betsy's subsequent decision to follow him.

sub_scenes.title: Devil's Pass Confrontation and Shooting
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the arrival at Devil's Pass, the confrontation, Betsy's intervention, and the ensuing shooting.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Devil's Pass and Confrontation

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Romantic Reunion at Devil's Pass
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the aftermath of the shooting, Betsy's survival, and the romantic reunion with Steve at Devil's Pass.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Survival and Reunion with Steve

Major_Arcs.title: New Ranch Conflicts and Carrie/Dave/Fred Triangle
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces new ranch-related conflicts and delves into the complicated relationships between Carrie, Dave, and Fred.

sub_scenes.title: Dave Argument and Ranch Issues
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with an argument about Dave, followed by observations of Curley's actions and news of trouble with Bar Fenin ranch buyers.

narrative_arcs.title: Trouble with Bar Fenin Ranch Buyers

sub_scenes.title: Fence Dispute and Gunfight
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the fence issue, leading to Fred Gordon's confrontation and a gunfight.

narrative_arcs.title: Discussing the Fence and Range Issues
Fred Gordon's Confrontation at the Fence

sub_scenes.title: Apology, Intimacy, and Fred's Reappearance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie's apology to Dave, their intimate conversation, and the unexpected reappearance of Fred Gordon.

narrative_arcs.title: Intimate Conversation and Reflection on Fred

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation, Confession, and Proposal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Carrie's confrontation with Fred, her private conversation with Dave, and the subsequent marriage proposal.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflection on Past Misunderstandings and Romantic Resolution
Confrontation and Inquiry with Dave and Fred

Major_Arcs.title: Resolution of Carrie and Fred Conflict and Romantic Climax with Dave
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc resolves the conflict between Carrie and Fred, showing Carrie's victory and her ultimate romantic resolution with Dave.

sub_scenes.title: Carlton's Office and Father's Comfort
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie and Fred at Carlton's office, followed by Carrie seeking emotional comfort from her father.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Interruption at Carlton's Office
Carlton's Business History and Carrie's Resolution

sub_scenes.title: Declaration of Independence and Romantic Proposal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features Carrie's declaration of independence, her encounter with Dave, and their romantic proposal and resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Declaration of Independence and Western Identity
Anger, Apology, and Question of Love
Father's Wisdom and Long Ride Home
Accusation of Heartbreak and Eastern Trickery
Reflection on Dave's Words and Embracing Love

Major_Arcs.title: Dirk's Desperate Actions and Pursuit
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Dirk's desperate actions, his injury, and the relentless pursuit by Rance.

sub_scenes.title: Dirk's Plea and Gunshot Reveal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with Dirk's desperate plea at Chris's window and the subsequent revelation that he has been shot.

sub_scenes.title: Investigation and Forced Search
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the older man investigating with the gun, Chris Ransom's arrival, and his forced search of the ranch.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Search and Blood Stained Pinto

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Moral Dilemma Regarding Dirk
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the confrontation about Dirk's actions, the moral dilemma about his fate, and his unexpected reunion with a woman.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Confession and Pursuit Planning
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Chris and Rance's romantic confessions and their planning for the pursuit of Dirk.

Major_Arcs.title: Chase, Confrontation, and Final Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc culminates in the chase, the confrontation between Rance and Dirk, and the final romantic and narrative resolutions.

sub_scenes.title: The Chase and Shooting
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the chase, Rance's relentless pursuit, and the violent confrontation where Rance shoots someone.

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath, Departure, and Return
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the aftermath of the shooting, the moral dilemma, Chris and Dirk's departure, and Chris's decision to return to Rance.

narrative_arcs.title: The Difficult Departure and Lingering Feelings

sub_scenes.title: Recovery, Confession, and Proposal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Rance's recovery, the mutual confession of love between Chris and Rance, and their marriage proposal.

narrative_arcs.title: Mutual Feelings and Confession of Love

sub_scenes.title: Wedding Day and Dirk's Final Appearance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the story with the wedding day, Dirk's unexpected arrival, and the Marshal's final words about Dirk's fate.

narrative_arcs.title: Chris's Concern and Rance's Reassurance about Dirk
The Marshal's Appreciation and Wedding Gift
